amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit judicial review of any consideration by the CFTC of the costs and benefits of its rules and orders.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 4 printed in House Report 113-476 to prohibit judicial review of any consideration by the CFTC of the costs and benefits of its rules and orders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 242 (Roll no. 344).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 242 (Roll no. 344).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Waters.
